page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: FARMING ------- AREA IS INTENSIVELY FARMED-SOIL TYPES MEDIUM TO HEAVY.LAND IS DRAINED BY DITCHES,CROPS ARE IRRIGATED DURING DRY WEATHER.MANY HEDGEROWS AND FOOTPATHS HAVE BEEN REMOVED TO INCREASE SIZE OF FIELDS.CROPS GROWN ARE WHEAT,BARLEY, OATS,RAPE,SUGAR BEET,POTATOES,BROAD BEANS,DWARF BEANS,PEAS,SPROUTS AND STRAWBERRIES.SOME CROPS GO STRAIGHT FOR PROCESSING AT A NEARBY FACTORY. ALL FARMS ARE HIGHLY MECHANISED ALTHOUGH HOEING IS STILL DONE BY HAND. CATTLE INCLUDE BOTH DAIRY AND BEEF HERDS.SOME SHEEP ARE GRAZED ON GRASSLAND.PIGS ARE INTENSIVELY REARED -HORSES ARE ALSO BRED FOR HUNTING. SMALL WOODLAND AREAS ARE USED FOR ROUGH GAME SHOOTS.PHEASANT & PARTRIDGE ARE SHOT.WOODS WHEN MATURE ARE EVENT- UALLY THINNED FOR TIMBER.
